const [previousUnlockCode, setPreviousUnlockCode] = useState(null); const unlockableContentChange = evt => { setUnlockCode(evt.target.value) } const updateUnlockCode = val => { setUnlockCode(val) } const checkUnlockableContent = evt => { evt.preventDefault(); break; default: setValidUnlockCode(false); } setPreviousUnlockCode(unlockCode); updateUnlockCode('') } return (
